thread.title: Shorthanded Judson nails down another Hammer Bowl
thread.title_full: Shorthanded Judson nails down another Hammer Bowl - San Antonio Express-News

author: Raul Dominguez Jr., For the Express-News
title: Shorthanded Judson nails down another Hammer Bowl
text:
Photo: Edward A. Ornelas, Staff / San Antonio Express-News Image 1 of / 1 Caption
Close
Image 1 of 1 Judson's Dreshon Govan heads to the end zone for a touchdown around the tackle of Wagner's Xavier McKinnies during second half action Friday Oct. 2, 2015 at D.W. Rutledge Stadium. Judson won 47-27.
Photo: Edward A. Ornelas, Staff / San Antonio Express-News Judson's Dreshon Govan heads to the end zone for a touchdown around... Shorthanded Judson nails down another Hammer Bowl 1 / 1 Back to Gallery Judson coach Sean McAuliffe glanced at his sideline and saw six starters unable to play because of injury at one point during his teamâ€™s showdown with rival Wagner.
Which only made him prouder of what the Rockets were able to do against the Thunderbirds in the 10th annual Hammer Bowl.
Judson fought their way for 486 total yards, holding off Wagner 47-27 in an offensive showdown Friday at Rutledge Stadium.
For more, visit ExpressNews.com
